title: Honest question: BA vs BFA
content:
Hola amigos.

I'm just wondering:

I want to get my MFA (in graphic design).

I am about <cite>60%</cite> sure that my school will not have the BA in Arts by the time I graduate.

That said: What types of things should I be aware of regarding applying to a GOOD MFA program? Will this really hamper me? Is it negligible?

There are a lot of opinions on this but you are all mostly experience professionals and I value your opinions.

Best—
author: James Deux
